title: RADS Error
body: I've tried the 8.8.8.8 8.8.4.4 method, replacing RADS_KERNEL_USER, running as administrator, changing compatibility settings (Windows XP Service 3 i think), deleting 2 folders:'Lol launcher', 'Lol launcher air' and even checking windows update. All have failed! {{item:3070}}

replies.body: I am having the same problem.

I'm getting the same issue too, as well as my brother. Seems like it's happening on the other side of the map; i came across the EUW forums where they are experiencing the same problems.

Also got this: http://puu.sh/ehAMr/61ce5b47f6.png
This is the thread: http://forums.euw.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=1892555 
(the issue was posted a few months ago but it was recently bumped)
OMG THX ALOT! IT WORKS FOR ME!
